Here's a semi-realistic sight for Type 90, based on this video
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=szoo2jyjEQ4

Although the sight shown on the video is not complete (has blurred section) and is an electronic Gunner Primary Sight. Because of this, it lacks rangefinding systems, ammo systems, gun zeroing etc since these are all handled by the Gunner's Periscope Sight system.

So what I've done is taken Egoistic_Lily's Type 90 sight (with permission https://live.warthunder.com/post/757456/en/ ), and tweaked it slightly, along with added ammunition range scales based on markings on the Gunner's Peris

This is the Sight I modified for the video I used on the leopard 2a4 which most of you have requested a link for.

Why did I make this?
It is a sight which works well for modern tanks in war thunder and adds to the feel and aesthetics of playing with such advanced and modern tanks. Sadly, the sight is not interactive.
Unfortunately the "DM23" does not change when you change the shell, so you will have to duplicate the file and edit the "DM23" and change it to the name of the shell you will be using and manually change the sight in the settings. The "ready" after the "DM23 SHELL" doesnt change

LT's IMPROVED ANTI-AIR SIGHTS - GERMANY

I haven't seen a lot of custom Anti-air sights for this game, and the default sight is kind of garbage for AA work.
This pack is my attempt at creating distinctive, superior, utility sights for every German SPAA vehicle (not including the Flak 88 truck).

The central region of each sight has been organized to provide an open picture, but still include elements to facilitate precise aim. Graduations along either side of the sight are arranged to make measuring lead from a test fire more intuitive.
